dct_title_s: 空中寫真測圖 要圖 西部パプア十万分一 -- Kūchū shashin sokuzu yōzu Seibu Papua 1:100,000, Maps Index
dct_description_sm: This polygon shapefile is an index to 1:100,000 scale maps of Papua, Indonesia, titled '空中寫真測圖 要圖 西部パプア十万分一 -- Kūchū shashin sokuzu yōzu Seibu Papua 1:100,000' This map series was originally produced by the Japanese Land Survey Department of the General Staff Headquarters between 1943 and 1944. Stanford University Libraries holds a large collection of Japanese military and imperial maps, referred to as gaihōzu, or "maps of outer lands." These maps were produced starting in the early Meiji (1868-1912) era and the end of World War II by the Land Survey Department of the General Staff Headquarters, the former Japanese Army. The Library is in the process of scanning and making available all of the maps in the collection. To create this index, footprints were generated using the fishnet tool, and metadata were supplied for the digitized paper maps by Stanford University Libraries. After the footprints were created, the shapefile was trimmed and labeled according to the sources.Relief is shown by form lines and spot heights. Most maps based on aerial photo maps made by Chi Dai 1602 Butai, Oka Dai 10414 Butai, and Oka Dai 1601 Butai.
This layer provides an index map that can be used to locate individual scanned map sheets.
dct_rights_sm: This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: This work is in the Public Domain, meaning that it is not subject to copyright.
